product_name: Patagonia Micro Puff Insulated Jacket - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The women's Patagonia Micro Puff Insulated Jacket features a water-resistant and windproof recycled-polyester shell with toasty, highly compressible 100g PrimaLoft(R) Sport insulation. Lightweight, windproof recycled-polyester shell fabric is treated with Deluge(R) durable water repellent finish. Insulated with soft, warm and compressible 100g PrimaLoft Sport that stays warm even when wet. Articulated elbows improve mobility; gasket cuffs enhance protection; drawcord hem seals out cold. Full-length front zipper has a low bulk wind flap. Zippered handwarmer pockets; 1 internal zippered storage pocket. Patagonia Micro Puff Insulated Jacket for women features subtle quilting on the sides. Closeout.
short_description: The women's Patagonia Micro Puff Insulated Jacket features a water-resistant and windproof recycled-polyester shell with toasty, highly compressible 100g PrimaLoft(R) Sport insulation.
